title: One interesting fanart for Mundo
body:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/8a57/th/pre/f/2013/105/c/4/dr_mundo_final_by_shun_008-d61st8v.jpg

He looks pretty damn good and crazy , opinions ? Keep in mind that Mundo is tier 1 in the VGU list . Would you like to see something like this picture in the game ?

replies.body:
He looks exactly the same, like if this was the end result of a Mundo rework I'd be wildly underwhelmed. I suppose something in animated action might change my impression, but yeah its a static image. 

Otherwise it's superb fan-art.

i want to see them take regeneration to a whole new lvl, if he takes enough damage have him actually lose a limb, but if he gets the health back he could regrow the limb, maybe taking too much damage would reduce his MS or AS, on account of having less legs/arms. It would be funny to see mundo hopping around the rift on one leg while he tries to headbutt you as  we waits for his other limbs to grow back

Looks like Blanka raided the Final Fantasy armory.

It's a cool picture for sure, but this doesn't read as Mundo at all to me.
It'd be pretty sick if he walked on all fours after his VU, though. Make him an actual monster of a man, a bit like Lifestealer in DotA but more zaun-y

Too much gorilla for me.
I would prefer to get back the Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde vibes he initially had, that he used to be a real doctor who experimented on himself.

I know some other fan concepts that I really enjoy because of that.
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/006/200/426/large/tom-barton-concept-2-v15.jpg?1496761631

And even if I know that it will never happen, since it is too far from his original design, but this is just awesome:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/cca9/th/pre/i/2017/313/0/d/dr__mundo_fan_version_by_karamlik-dbt710z.jpg
i think they need to completely delete the champion and replace him with another champion with the same name because hes just a rip off of the hulk and its not much u can do with that in a rework.

And the hulk is just a rip off from Mr. Hyde.
But that doesn't mean it can't work. The Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde trope is really popular in my experience and I think they should go that way again, but just add their own twist to it to make it different from the hulk and Hyde.

Just like Warwick was a generic werewolf and still fills the werewolf trope in LoL, but the rework changed him to be a Chemtech chimeras who still hugely resembles a werewolf, but without actually being one.

I have faith that they can do the same with Dr. Mundo. Even made an own thread talking about how I imagine they could accomplish that.

He's very gorilla-ish.
Even if it adds a bit more "wild mad guy" feel to him I don't think it really corresponds him.
The art is sick though.
